TopicTitle: Can you change the amount of Drag a part Experiences in the Config files?

Articles.Content:
I have tried changing the minimum and maximum drag but they dont seem to make any difference.

I am playing 1.11
I do not know but I bet the modders do, and so your thread has been to the modding subforum.

I'm editing a cfg file for a starship model. the nosecone and fuel tank are seperate parts so I need to be able to increase the nosecone drag and decrease the Fuel tank drag to make it stable during a bellyflop.
